hook.text: Your gut bacteria outnumber human cells. Scientists are learning they control far more than digestion.

buildup.text: The microbiome influences immunity, mood, weight, and even your response to cancer treatment.

discovery.text: Fecal transplants cure life-threatening C. difficile infections with a 90% success rate.

twist.text: Every microbiome is unique as a fingerprint. Universal probiotic advice can't work for everyone.

climax.text: Future medicine may prescribe specific bacterial strains tailored to your unique microbiome profile.

punchline.text: The bacteria inside you may be medicine's next frontier.

quiz.question: What success rate do fecal transplants have for C. difficile?
